adrFormatAddress: 1611 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA

editorialSummary.text: Classic Thai cuisine and cocktails served in a brick-lined space with weathered woods and a stylish bar.

originalText.text:
We had a great time at Bua Thai Ramen and Robata Grill! The decor was warm and inviting. The flowers all over the restaurant looked great.

The service was great. Our waiter helped us determine which dishes would go well together and everything we ordered tasted great. In addition to taste, the presentation of each dish was excellent.

Decorative drinks served in fruits made the meal so fun. Each dish not only tasted great but looked just as good.

I'd highly recommend the crispy rice spicy tuna and the pineapple fried rice!

originalText.text: I had an absolutely amazing experience at Bua Thai Ramen & Robata Grill with my boyfriend! The ambiance of the restaurant was top tier. Great music, decor, and wonderful staff working. The food was SO delicious. I cannot wait to go back for more! We are obsessed with the fried tofu appetizer and Vegetable dumplings. I ordered Pad Thai and it was fabulous! The serving portions are also very generous. The fried ice cream was a fantastic way to top off the night! It was my first time trying fried ice cream and it did not disappoint!

text.text: I had an absolutely amazing experience at Bua Thai Ramen & Robata Grill with my boyfriend! The ambiance of the restaurant was top tier. Great music, decor, and wonderful staff working. The food was SO delicious. I cannot wait to go back for more! We are obsessed with the fried tofu appetizer and Vegetable dumplings. I ordered Pad Thai and it was fabulous! The serving portions are also very generous. The fried ice cream was a fantastic way to top off the night! It was my first time trying fried ice cream and it did not disappoint!

originalText.text:
Bua Thai Ramen & Robata Grill offers a captivating dining experience, where culinary excellence and scenic beauty converge to create a memorable outing. The Grilled Salmon with Coconut Noodles and Jumbo Shrimp stand out as delectable choices on the menu.

The culinary highlight, the Grilled Salmon, is a testament to the chef's expertise, perfectly cooked and complemented by the delightful coconut noodles. The Jumbo Shrimp, another star of the menu, adds a succulent touch to the dining experience, showcasing a harmonious blend of flavors.

The beverage selection at Bua Thai Ramen & Robata Grill is equally impressive, with great drinks that complement the diverse menu. The combination of well-crafted cocktails or other beverage options enhances the overall dining experience.

Adding to the charm of the culinary delights is the beautiful scenery that envelops the restaurant. Whether it's an outdoor setting with natural surroundings or an artfully designed interior, the visual appeal further elevates the dining ambiance.

In summary, Bua Thai Ramen & Robata Grill offers a culinary journey marked by exceptional dishes, great drinks, and a picturesque setting. It's a destination that caters to those seeking not just a meal but an immersive experience that engages the senses.

originalText.text:
Amazing spot to grab lunch or have a cute dinner date! The atmosphere was so cozy and it was beautiful. The service was amazing, food came out very quickly! The waitress made sure we had everything we needed and recommended us some amazing dishes!! The food was absolutely amazing. I was speechless by how good it was. They had amazing appetizers, I would 100% recommend the crispy rice with spicy tuna! The Thai style ramen was super flavorful and I love the Thai twist they added! Their pineapple fried rice was so decadent and had an explosion of flavor. The Thai ice tea was one of the best Thai ice tea I ever had, it was a great balance! For dessert, the mango sticky rice was the perfect way to end off the meal. Everything paired well together!
Amazing Thai spot! I would definitely visit again!

originalText.text: This place has some of the best Thai food that I have ever had! Not only that, but it has the best interior decor, and makes you feel like you are in an oasis. The food is tasteful, delicious, and the drinks were just as good! I highly recommend getting the crispy rice, it was some of the best I’ve ever had!!
